get.description: Returns the account information.

post.description: Returns the account information for an array of accounts.

get.description: Gets an array of transactions for which an account is the sender or receiver.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of transactions to return for each request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Transaction identifier up to which transactions are returned.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description:
Ordering criteria:
* -id - Descending order by id.
* id - Ascending order by id.

get.description:
Gets an array of incoming transactions. A transaction is said to be incoming with respect to an account
if the account is the recipient of the transaction.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of transactions to return for each request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Transaction identifier up to which transactions are returned.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description:
Ordering criteria:
* -id - Descending order by id.
* id - Ascending order by id.

get.description:
Gets an array of outgoing transactions. A transaction is said to be outgoing with respect to an account
if the account is the sender of the transaction.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of transactions to return for each request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Transaction identifier up to which transactions are returned.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description:
Ordering criteria:
* -id - Descending order by id.
* id - Ascending order by id.

get.description: Gets the array of transactions not included in a block where an account is the sender or receiver.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of transactions to return for each request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Transaction identifier up to which transactions are returned.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description:
Ordering criteria:
* -id - Descending order by id.
* id - Ascending order by id.

get.description: Gets an array of aggregate bonded transactions where the account is the sender or requires to cosign the transaction.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of transactions to return for each request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Transaction identifier up to which transactions are returned.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description:
Ordering criteria:
* -id - Descending order by id.
* id - Ascending order by id.

get.description: Gets a block from the chain that has the given height.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
Block height.
If height -1 is not a multiple of the limit provided, the inferior closest multiple + 1 is used instead.

get.description: Gets up to limit number of blocks after given block height.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
Block height.
If height -1 is not a multiple of the limit provided, the inferior closest multiple + 1 is used instead.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of elements to be returned.

get.description: Returns an array of transactions included in a block for a given block height.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
Block height.
If height -1 is not a multiple of the limit provided, the inferior closest multiple + 1 is used instead.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of transactions to return for each request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Transaction identifier up to which transactions are returned.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description:
Ordering criteria:
* -id - Descending order by id.
* id - Ascending order by id.

get.summary: Get the merkle path for a given a transaction and block
get.description:
Returns the merkle path for a transaction included in a block.
The path is the complementary data needed to calculate the merkle root.
A client can compare if the calculated root equals the one recorded in the
block header, verifying that the transaction was included in the block.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
Block height.
If height -1 is not a multiple of the limit provided, the inferior closest multiple + 1 is used instead.

get.summary: Get the current height of the chain
get.description: Returns the current height of the blockchain.

get.summary: Get the current score of the chain
get.description:
Gets the current score of the blockchain. The higher the score, the better the chain.
During synchronization, nodes try to get the best blockchain in the network.

The score for a block is derived from its difficulty and the time (in seconds) that has elapsed since the last block:

    block score = difficulty âˆ’ time elapsed since last block

get.summary: Get the storage information of the node
get.description: Returns diagnostic information about the node storage.

get.summary: Get the version of the running rest component
get.description: Returns the version of the running catapult-rest component.

get.summary: Get the current network type of the chain
get.description: Returns the current network type.
Supplies additional information about the application running on a node.
Gets the node time at the moment the reply was sent and received.
Returns transaction information given a transactionId or hash.

put.description:
Announces a transaction to the network.
We recommended to use the NEM2-SDK to announce transactions as they should be serialized.

post.description: Returns transactions information for a given array of transactionIds.

get.description: Returns the transaction status for a given hash.

post.description: Returns an array of transaction statuses for a given array of transaction hashes.

put.description: Announces an aggregate bonded transaction to the network.
Announces a cosignature transaction to the network.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Metadata identifier up to which metadata are returned.

parameters.name: ordering

Ordering criteria:
* -id - Descending order by id.
* id - Ascending order by id.

get.description: Returns the account metadata given an account id and a key.
Returns the mosaic metadata given a mosaic id and a key.
Returns the namespace metadata given a namespace id and a key.
Returns the account metadata given an account id, a key, and a sender.
Returns the mosaic metadata given a mosaic id, a key, and a sender.
Returns the namespace metadata given a namespace id, a key, and a sender.
Gets the mosaic definition for a given mosaic identifier.

post.description: Gets an array of mosaic definition.

get.summary: Get mosaics created by an account
get.description: Gets an array of mosaics created for a given account address.

post.summary: Get mosaics created for given array of addresses
post.description: Gets mosaics created for a given array of addresses.

get.description: Returns the multisig account information.
Returns the multisig account graph.
Gets the namespace for a given namespace identifier.

get.summary: Get namespaces created by an account
get.description: Gets an array of namespaces for a given account address.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of transactions to return for each request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Namespace identifier up to which transactions are returned.

post.description: Gets namespaces for a given array of addresses.

post.summary: Get readable names for a set of accountIds
Get readable names for a set of mosaics
Get readable names for a set of namespaces

get.description: Returns the receipts linked to a block.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
Block height.
If height -1 is not a multiple of the limit provided, the inferior closest multiple + 1 is used instead.

get.summary: Get the merkle path for a given a receipt statement hash and block
get.description:
Returns the merkle path for a receipt statement or resolution linked to a block.
The path is the complementary data needed to calculate the merkle root.
A client can compare if the calculated root equals the one recorded in the block header,
verifying that the receipt was linked with the block.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
Block height.
If height -1 is not a multiple of the limit provided, the inferior closest multiple + 1 is used instead.

get.description: Returns the account restrictions for a given account.

post.summary: Get account restrictions for given array of addresses
post.description: Returns the account restrictions for a given array of addresses.

get.summary: Get mosaic global restriction for a given mosaic identifier.
get.description: Get mosaic global restriction.

post.summary: Get mosaic address restrictions for a given mosaic and account identifiers array.

get.summary: Get mosaic address restrictions for a given mosaic and account identifier.
get.description: Get mosaic address restriction.

post.summary: Get mosaic global restrictions for an array of mosaics.

Amount.description: Absolute amount. An amount of 123456789 (absolute) for a mosaic with divisibility 6 means 123.456789 (relative).

BlockDuration.description: Duration expressed in number of blocks.

BlockFeeMultiplier.description: Fee multiplier applied to transactions contained in block.

Difficulty.description: Defines how difficult it will be to harvest next the block, based on previous blocks.

Importance.description: Probability of an account to harvest the next block.

MetadataKey.description: Metadata key scoped to source, target and type.

Score.description:
Score of the blockchain.During synchronization, nodes try to get the
blockchain with highest score in the network.

Signature.description: Entity's signature generated by the signer.

Timestamp.description: Number of seconds elapsed since the creation of the nemesis block.

UnresolvedAddress.description:
Address decoded. If the bit 0 of byte 0 is not set (like in 0x90), then it is a
regular address. Else (e.g. 0x91) it represents a namespace id which starts at byte 1.

UnresolvedMosaicId.description:
Mosaic identifier. If the most significant bit of byte 0 is set, a namespaceId (alias)
is used instead of the real mosaic identifier.

RestrictionValue.description: A value in a restriction transaction.

AccountTypeEnum.description:
* 0 - Unlinked.
* 1 - Balance-holding account that is linked to a remote harvester account.
* 2 - Remote harvester account that is linked to a balance-holding account.
* 3 - Remote harvester eligible account that is unlinked.

mosaics.description:
Mosaic units owned. The amount is represented in absolute amount.
Thus a balance of 123456789 for a mosaic with divisibility 6 (absolute) means the account owns 123.456789.

merklePath.description: Complementary data needed to calculate the merkle root.

NetworkTypeEnum.description:
Network type:
* 0x60 (96 decimal) - Private network.
* 0x90 (144 decimal) - Private test network.
* 0x68 (104 decimal) - Public main network.
* 0x98 (152 decimal) - Public test network.

description.description: A short text describing the network.

RolesTypeEnum.description:
Role of the node:
* 1 - Peer node.
* 2 - Api node.

TransactionTypeEnum.description:
Type of transaction:
* 0x414C (16716 decimal) - AccountLinkTransaction.
* 0x4141 (16705 decimal) - AggregateCompleteTransaction.
* 0x4241 (16961 decimal) - AggregateBondedTransaction.
* 0x414D (16717 decimal) - MosaicDefinitionTransaction.
* 0x424D (16973 decimal) - MosaicSupplyChangeTransaction.
* 0x414E (16718 decimal) - NamespaceRegistrationTransaction.
* 0x424E (16974 decimal) - AddressAliasTransaction.
* 0x434E (17230 decimal) - MosaicAliasTransaction.
* 0x4144 (16708 decimal) - AccountMetadataTransaction.
* 0x4244 (16964 decimal) - MosaicMetadataTransaction.
* 0x4344 (17220 decimal) - NamespaceMetadataTransaction.
* 0x4155 (16725 decimal) - MultisigAccountModificationTransaction.
* 0x4148 (16712 decimal) - HashLockTransaction.
* 0x4152 (16722 decimal) - SecretLockTransaction.
* 0x4252 (16978 decimal) - SecretProofTransaction.
* 0x4150 (16720 decimal) - AccountAddressRestrictionTransaction.
* 0x4250 (16976 decimal) - AccountMosaicRestrictionTransaction.
* 0x4350 (17232 decimal) - AccountOperationRestrictionTransaction.
* 0x4151 (16721 decimal) - MosaicGlobalRestrictionTransaction.
* 0x4251 (16977 decimal) - MosaicAddressRestrictionTransaction.
* 0x4154 (16724 decimal) - TransferTransaction.

AccountLinkTransactionDTO.description: Delegates the account importance score to a proxy account.

transactions.description: Array of transactions initiated by different accounts.

AggregateTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to combine multiple transactions together.

HashLockTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to lock funds before sending an aggregate bonded transaction.

LockHashAlgorithmEnum.description:
Algorithm used to hash te proof:
* 0 (Op_Sha3_256) - Proof is hashed using sha3 256.
* 1 (Op_Keccak_256) - Proof is hashed using Keccak (ETH compatibility).
* 2 (Op_Hash_160) - Proof is hashed twice: first with Sha-256 and then with RIPEMD-160 (bitcoinâ€™s OP_HASH160).
* 3 (Op_Hash_256) - Proof is hashed twice with Sha-256 (bitcoinâ€™s OP_HASH256).

SecretLockTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to sends mosaics to a recipient if the proof used is revealed. If the duration is reached, the locked funds go back to the sender of the transaction.

valueSizeDelta.description: Change in value size in bytes.

value.description: When there is an existing value, the new value is calculated as xor(previous-value, value).

AccountMetadataTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to create or modify a multisig account.

valueSizeDelta.description: Change in value size in bytes.

value.description: When there is an existing value, the new value is calculated as xor(previous-value, value).

MosaicMetadataTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to create or modify a multisig account.

valueSizeDelta.description: Change in value size in bytes.

value.description: When there is an existing value, the new value is calculated as xor(previous-value, value).

NamespaceMetadataTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to create or modify a multisig account.

MosaicFlagsEnum.description:
- 0x00 (none) - No flags present.
- 0x01 (supplyMutable) - Mosaic supports supply changes even when mosaic owner owns partial supply.
- 0x02 (transferable) - Mosaic supports transfers between arbitrary accounts. When not set, mosaic can only be transferred to and from mosaic owner.
- 0x04 (restrictable) - Mosaic supports custom restrictions configured by mosaic owner.

MosaicSupplyChangeActionEnum.description:
Direction of the supply change:
* 0  - Decrease.
* 1  - Increase.

nonce.description: Random nonce used to generate the mosaic id.

divisibility.description:
Determines up to what decimal place the mosaic can be divided.
Divisibility of 3 means that a mosaic can be divided into smallest parts of 0.001 mosaics.
The divisibility must be in the range of 0 and 6.

MosaicDefinitionTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to create a new mosaic.

revision.description: Number of definitions for the same mosaic.

divisibility.description:
Determines up to what decimal place the mosaic can be divided.
Divisibility of 3 means that a mosaic can be divided into smallest parts of 0.001 mosaics.
The divisibility must be in the range of 0 and 6.

MosaicSupplyChangeTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to increase or decrease the supply of a mosaic.

multisigEntries.description: Array of multisig accounts for this level.

minRemovalDelta.description:
Number of signatures needed to remove a cosignatory.
If we are modifying an existing multisig account, this indicates the relative change of the minimum cosignatories.

minApprovalDelta.description:
Number of signatures needed to approve a transaction.
If we are modifying an existing multisig account, this indicates the relative change of the minimum cosignatories.

publicKeyAdditions.description: Array of cosignatory accounts to add.

publicKeyDeletions.description: Array of cosignatory accounts to delete.

MultisigAccountModificationTransactionDT.description: Transaction to create or modify a multisig account.

minApproval.description: Number of signatures needed to approve a transaction.

minRemoval.description: Number of signatures needed to remove a cosignatory.

cosignatoryPublicKeys.description: Array of public keys of the cosignatory accounts.

multisigPublicKeys.description: Array of multisig accounts where the account is cosignatory.

AliasActionEnum.description:
Alias action:
* 0 - Unlink alias.
* 1 - Link alias.

AliasTypeEnum.description:
Type of alias:
* 0 - No alias.
* 1 - Mosaic id alias.
* 2 - Addres alias.

NamespaceRegistrationTypeEnum.description:
Type of namespace:
* 0 - Root namespace.
* 1 - Subnamespace.

AddressAliasTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to link a namespace to an account.

MosaicAliasTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to link a namespace to a mosaic.

NamespaceRegistrationTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to create or renew a namespace.

ReceiptTypeEnum.description:
Type of receipt:
* 0x124D (4685 decimal) - Mosaic_Rental_Fee.
* 0x134E (4942 decimal) - Namespace_Rental_Fee.
* 0x2143 (8515 decimal) - Harvest_Fee.
* 0x2248 (8776 decimal) - LockHash_Completed.
* 0x2348 (9032 decimal) - LockHash_Expired.
* 0x2252 (8786 decimal) - LockSecret_Completed.
* 0x2352 (9042 decimal) - LockSecret_Expired.
* 0x3148 (12616 decimal) - LockHash_Created.
* 0x3152 (12626 decimal) - LockSecret_Created.
* 0x414D (16717 decimal) - Mosaic_Expired.
* 0x414E (16718 decimal) - Namespace_Expired.
* 0x424E (16974 decimal) - Namespace_Deleted.
* 0x5143 (20803 decimal) - Inflation.
* 0xE143 (57667 decimal) - Transaction_Group.
* 0xF143 (61763 decimal) - Address_Alias_Resolution.
* 0xF243 (62019 decimal) - Mosaic_Alias_Resolution.

BalanceTransferReceiptDTO.description: Invisible state change that triggered a mosaic transfer.

BalanceChangeReceiptDTO.description: Invisible state change that changed an account balance.

NamespaceExpiryReceiptDTO.description: An namespace expired in this block.

MosaicExpiryReceiptDTO.description: A mosaic expired in this block.

InflationReceiptDTO.description: Native currency mosaics that were created due to inflation.

resolutionEntries.description:
Array of resolution entries linked to the unresolved namespaceId.
It is an array instead of a single resolution entry since
within one block the resolution might change for different sources due to alias related transactions.

ResolutionStatementDTO.description:
A resolution statement keeps the relation between a namespace alias used in a transaction
and the real address or mosaicId.

secondaryId.description:
Transaction index inside within the aggregate transaction.
If the transaction is not an inner transaction, then the secondary id is set to 0.

transactionStatements.description: Array of transaction statements for the block requested.

addressResolutionStatements.description: Array of address resolutions for the block requested.

mosaicResolutionStatements.description: Array of mosaic resolutions for the block requested.

StatementsDTO.description: Collection of transaction statements and resolutions triggered for the block requested.

TransactionStatementDTO.description: Collection of receipts related to a transaction.

AccountRestrictionFlagsEnum.description:
Type of account restriction:
* 0x0001 (1 decimal) - Allow only incoming transactions from a given address.
* 0x0002 (2 decimal) - Allow only incoming transactions containing a given mosaic identifier.
* 0x4001 (16385 decimal) - Allow only outgoing transactions to a given address.
* 0x4004 (16388 decimal) - Allow only outgoing transactions with a given transaction type.
* 0x8001 (32769 decimal) - Block incoming transactions from a given address.
* 0x8002 (32770 decimal) - Block incoming transactions containing a given mosaic identifier.
* 0xC001 (49153 decimal) - Block outgoing transactions to a given address.
* 0xC004 (49156 decimal) - Block outgoing transactions with a given transaction type.

AccountAddressRestrictionTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to prevent incoming and outgoing transactions for a given a set of addresses.

AccountMosaicRestrictionTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to prevent incoming transactions containing a given set of mosaics.

AccountOperationRestrictionTransactionDT.description: Transaction to prevent outgoing transactions by transaction type.

values.description: Address, mosaic id, or transaction type to restrict.

MosaicRestrictionEntryTypeEnum.description:
- 0 - Mosaic address restriction.
- 1 - Mosaic global restriction.

MosaicRestrictionTypeEnum.description:
Type of mosaic restriction.
* 0 - Uninitialized value indicating no restriction.
* 1 (EQ) - Allow if equal.
* 2 (NE) - Allow if not equal.
* 3 (LT) - Allow if less than.
* 4 (LE) - Allow if less than or equal.
* 5 (GT) - Allow if greater than.
* 6 (GE) - Allow if greater than or equal.

MosaicAddressRestrictionTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to set a restriction rule to an address.

MosaicGlobalRestrictionTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to set a network-wide restriction rule to a mosaic.

MessageTypeEnum.description:
Type of message:
* 0 - Regular message.
* 1 - Encrypted message.
* 254 - Persistent harvesting delegation.

payload.description: Content of the message in hexadecimal.

mosaics.description: Array of mosaics sent to the recipient.

TransferTransactionDTO.description: Transaction to transfer mosaics and a message to another account.

height.name: height
height.description:
Block height.
If height -1 is not a multiple of the limit provided, the inferior closest multiple + 1 is used instead.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Number of elements to be returned.

metadataIdLimit.name: id
metadataIdLimit.description: Metadata identifier up to which metadata are returned.

namespaceIdLimit.name: id
namespaceIdLimit.description: Namespace identifier up to which transactions are returned.

ordering.name: ordering
ordering.description:
Ordering criteria:
* -id - Descending order by id.
* id - Ascending order by id.

pageSize.name: pageSize
pageSize.description: Number of transactions to return for each request.

transactionIdLimit.name: id
transactionIdLimit.description: Transaction identifier up to which transactions are returned.
